patterns: How can I get malware from clicking links
How safe are clicking links in the email?
I clicked a link, is my browser safe?
responses: Clicking links about which you have no ideas can be risky as there are frameworks which allow attackers to hijack browsers
Sometimes clicking the link itself might not be harmful (not necessarily) but entering sensitive data on such sites can be very dangerous
Phishing is a form of cyber attack where the attacker tries to steal user data by taking them to a site which poses like a legitimate site but isn't. This can compromise essential user data.

Phishing is a form of social engineering where attackers deceive people into revealing sensitive information or installing malware such as ransomware. It is a very common method which hackers use to gain access to systems or browsers.
